author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Kinwong Electronic to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on May 11
text:
May 4 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Kinwong Electronic Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.50 yuan(before tax)/share for 2017 to shareholders of record on May 10
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 11 and the dividend will be paid on May 11
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/zd4Gkm
